about_the_game:
MORTAL QUEST

Follow John, a mortal who has been transferred to an island infested by monsters and demons. You must guide him through dangerous challenges in order to prove himself worthy to fulfill an ancient prophecy. Meet uncomprehensible foes and even some unexpected allies on this unforgettable journey.
